text: Motion

── I'm Madoka Higuchi.
Nice to meet you.
Photographer

Oh, nice to meet you too.
Just wait a bit until the setup is done.

...Don't feel too nervous. Ask away if there's
anything you don't understand about the photoshoot.
Let's do our best without stressing out too much!
Motion
You're the type that's really into your work, aren't you?
Huh? I-I guess so...?
Yes, to the point it's unpleasant.

Haha... Well, I like to think of it as my strong point.
But lately I've been scolded for my overtime──

Indeed.
Mr. Old School.

Can't you do your job without getting passionate over
every little thing?
Good work, you gas-guzzler.
Motion

I'm surprised, you had a good expression.
And you responded accurately to the pose calls...
That's good to hear.

It's almost a waste to just keep it a promo photo,
but... I'll get lots of jobs for you with this!

Yeah.
Don't overdo it.
......Overdo it? Haha......
...That's not something to laugh about, is it.

Do you think everything will work out with a smile?
Acting as if it's nothing.
Huh, no, I didn't mean...

...Well, I guess I do want to appear composed.
I want to be able to talk to you as equals, Madoka.
...Equals?

I know it might be too much to ask right now but someday.
I want to be on the same level as your childhood friends...
...Huh?

──is something I wouldn't even dare to suggest...!
I know I can't intrude on your relationships with your friends.
...I see.
I don't know what you mean.
...Do you like your childhood friends?

I don't really bother thinking about liking or disliking.
It's like, an inescapable relationship.
I see...
Ah, but, I see...

As long as you all continue being idols,
that'll keep you guys together, huh.
...Well, who knows.

Today's schedule is over, right?
Can we call it a day here?

Huh? Oh, um... yeah.
There's no more plans, but I can drive you home if you want...

It's fine.
I can go home on my own.
─Goodybe...

.........Not to say that I'll ever be able
to speak to her like her childhood friends...
...But I sure have a long way to go...
